Device troubleshooting.topic: Device malfunctions and troubleshooting (e.g., smartphones, laptops)

expectations.expectation: Get clear, step-by-step instructions to solve the issue
Receive a solution that doesn't require advanced technical knowledge

expectations.intent: Understand why the device is malfunctioning
expectations.expectation: Get a simple explanation of the likely cause without technical jargon

expectations.intent: Understand why the device is malfunctioning
expectations.expectation: Learn how to prevent this issue in the future

expectations.intent: Fix a software bug or error
expectations.expectation: Get precise instructions to resolve the issue quickly

expectations.intent: Fix a software bug or error
expectations.expectation: Find out if there's a workaround until a permanent fix is available
Get an explanation that helps prevent the issue in the future
Learn if this is a problem with the software or with my usage
Get troubleshooting steps that quickly restore connection
Determine if the issue is on my end or with my service provider
Identify the root cause of recurring issues
Get recommendations for hardware or service upgrades if needed

expectations.expectation: Get a straightforward comparison with pros and cons
